alert.note: Alert for Bosque (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 28 at 8:32AM CDT until October 29 at 8:20AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... North Bosque River Near Clifton affecting Bosque County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Bosque River near Clifton. * WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, At 30 feet, water approaches hwy 22 in meridian and hwy 1991 northeast of clifton. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 22.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 23.0 feet. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 29.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
